ack.content: GLObal Robotic telescopes Intelligent Array for e-Science (GLORIA) is a project funded by the European Union Seventh Framework Programme (FP7/2007-2012) under grant agreement number 283783. Any opinions, findings, conclusions or recommendations expressed in this website are those of the author(s) and do not necessarily reflect the views of EC or any Institution involved in the GLORIA project.
